org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap
Class SearchableLdapGroupServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.ldap.SearchableLdapGroupServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, BasicLdapService, LdapGroupService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class SearchableLdapGroupServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements LdapGroupService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, java.io.Serializable

An implementation of LdapGroupService that delegates to a CachingLdapEntityServiceImpl.
